name: Undead Alliance, a FPS Zombie Survival Indie Game.
blurb: An Upcoming Zombie FPS Horror Survival Game developed by 2 developers on the UDK & Unity  Engine. Are you ready to defeat the zombies?

rewards.reward: This reward is for the people who want to support the project, but can only spare a pound. In this package you get the monthly newsletter, informing you of all that is going on with DeadZ.
This package lets you pre-order a copy of the game, your name in the credits and the monthly newsletter. Digital Download

This package lets you pre-order a copy of the game, your name in the credits and the monthly newsletter and you also receive multiple exclusive items such as weapons and items to use within the game. This is available just for the first 25 people. Digital Download

This package lets you pre-order a copy of the game, your name in the credits and the monthly newsletter. Also you get a beta access to the game to be able to test out the game and give improvements if you wish to do so. The beta will be released 6-9 months before the full release of the game.

This reward comes with a child/ teenager or adult sized t-shirt (your choice) as well as a copy of the game. Ontop of this, there is also the monthly newsletter and the opportunity to have your name in the credits. .  Estimated delivery for everything except the game is 5 months.

This perk gives the buyer a copy of the game. As well as that, this perk also gives the user a t-shirt in the size of their choice and a copy of the in game soundtrack. This package also contains the usual of the monthly newsletter and your name in the credits. Also get the chance to test the game early in the stage and help out in development.  Estimated delivery for everything except the game is 5 months.

Collector's edition: In this collectors edition you recieve items that are rare, and will only be available from our crowdsource funding campaigns. These include a personal letter of thanks from the developers, a copy of the game, the monthly newsletter, a t-shirt in a size of your choice, your name in the credits and access from beta onwards. You will also have the option to develop your own model of a zombie/gun/level and include it in the game, or we can model an item of your choice. Estimated delivery for everything except the game is 5 months.

Extra Collectors Edition:.Extra Collectors Edition contains a copy of the game and the soundtrack in a steel case, an adult sized t-shirt, your name in the credits, the monthly newsletter, Beta Access and a zombie action figure, and all the other things offered in the original collectors edition. Estimated delivery for everything except the game is 5 months.

Vlad's Collectors Edition: This perk was specifically created by Vlad, one of the lead developers' of DeadZ. Vlad's Collectors Edition contains: a copy of the game and the soundtrack in a steel case, an adult sized t-shirt, your name in the credits, the monthly newsletter, beta access, a poster signed by the developers, three seconds dedicated to you in the game intro and a zombie action figure. You also get a mini zombie statue with the DeadZ logo and all the other things offered in the original collectors edition. Estimated delivery for everything except the game is 5 months.
